descriptions: A frightening tale about a dragon. Sorcery, betrayal, and an extraordinary fantasy world.
A story about vampires from a small town. Treachery, an unconventional plot, and the extraordinary adventures of a priest.
To walk or to stop? A question without a right answer. A story about a long and deadly walk.
How to lose weight without going crazy? And how to gain it back? An unusual story of confrontation.
Answer the call and turn into a zombie. A story about zombification through communication devices.
Guilty or not? It doesn't matter. The outcome is the same. Superpowers won't help.
Even cars have souls. Is that a good thing? A mystical story about a car.
A crime saga from the inimitable Mario Puzo. Shootouts, chases, betrayal, and friendship.
The world is not only inhabited by humans. Others live among them and visually look no different. A story about magic and powerful beings. The struggle between the forces of Good and Evil.
